Title: Relates to participation in the shared work program under the unemployment insurance law
Summary: Allows employers to participate in the shared work program under the unemployment insurance law retroactively to the date of the COVID-19 declared emergency.
LawCode: Add ยง605-a, amd ยง604, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the participation in the shared work program under the unemployment insurance law
